CustomField.description: Enables project cloning from the wizard to execute as a batch job. Enable this setting if you are receiving Apex CPU Limit exceptions when cloning complex projects and templates.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables project cloning from the wizard to execute as a batch job. Enable this setting if you are receiving Apex CPU Limit exceptions when cloning complex projects and templates.
CustomField.label: Enable Batch Project Cloning
